title: TypeError: Cannot read property 'call' of undefined at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/cli.bundled.js:175527:50

body: @JackPickering I'm going to close this as a duplicate of your other report [here](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/issues/326#issuecomment-374979284). Happy to continue in that thread. Thanks!
